meanings.definition: Make or become silent or calm.
meanings.sent1: The teacher quiets the noisy classroom.
meanings.sent2: The sound of rain quiets my mind before bed.
meanings.sent3: The baby's cry quiets as soon as she sees her favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The gentle lullaby quiets the restless baby to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The serene sunset quiets the bustling city streets.

meanings.definition: A period of calm or tranquility.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, there was a peaceful quiet in the air.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the quiets of nature when I go hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The sudden quiets in the office always make me suspicious of pranks.
meanings.sent4: The quiets of the library were disturbed by a loud sneeze.
meanings.sent5: The quiets of the early morning were broken by the chirping of birds.
